name: paravan interactive
overview:
paravan interactive lives for the Internet. In Slovakia, we first got a taste of web advertising in the year 2000, under the name of ad pepper media which we proudly carried until the beginning of 2009. Since then we have been here for you as paravan interactive â€“ but we only changed the name and not the quality of our services. Our team has worked in the company for nearly 9 years. This is a guarantee of great experience in the field of Internet marketing. Internet marketing has great potential and indisputable advantages over other media types. The advantages of the Internet as a fitting communication medium and our knowledge of the local market with all its opportunities guarantee our clients a professional meeting of their requirements in Internet marketing.

We are a certified partner of ETARGET and the holder of the ADWORDS QUALIFIED INDIVIDUAL certificate.

You can find us on Facebook, LinkedIn and Twitter.
